languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы вновь находимся в зоне досягаемости протектората фон Валанциус. Необходимо как можно скорее восстановить связь с принадлежащими вам планетами и одарить их управителей вашими мудрыми распоряжениями. Развитие ваших колоний, присоединение новых владений и заключение торговых связей — все это теперь ваша привилегия... и бремя".

"Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы вновь находимся в зоне досягаемости протектората фон Валанциус. Необходимо как можно скорее восстановить связь с принадлежащими вам планетами и одарить их управителей вашими мудрыми распоряжениями. Развитие ваших колоний, присоединение новых владений и заключение торговых связей — все это теперь ваша привилегия... и бремя".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius trade empire. The astropathic choir humbly stands ready to send your orders to servants of the dynasty and the planetary rulers of your colonies. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade connections — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

"Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius trade empire. The astropathic choir humbly stands ready to send your orders to servants of the dynasty and the planetary rulers of your colonies. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade connections — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

"Lord Captain, I bring great news for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are once more within reach of the von Valancius trade empire. The Astropathic Choir humbly stands ready to send your orders to servants of the dynasty and the planetary rulers of your colonies. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

"Lord Captain, I bring great news for Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are once more within reach of the von Valancius trade empire. The Astropathic Choir humbly stands ready to send your orders to servants of the dynasty and the planetary rulers of your colonies. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

"Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们再次来到了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的疆域。目前的当务之急，是恢复与其他行星的通讯，并将您的智慧与法令告知这些行星的总督。开发殖民地、拓展新的疆土、建立贸易联系——如今，这一切都是您的特权……也是您的重担。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们再次来到了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的疆域。目前的当务之急，是恢复与其他行星的通讯，并将您的智慧与法令告知这些行星的总督。开发殖民地、拓展新的疆土、建立贸易联系——如今，这一切都是您的特权……也是您的重担。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, volvemos a estar cerca del protectorado von Valancius. Es esencial reanudar las comunicaciones con sus planetas y otorgar la sabiduría de sus decretos sobre sus respectivos administradores. Desarrollar colonias, capturar nuevos territorios y establecer rutas comerciales: todo esto es ahora su privilegio... y su carga».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, volvemos a estar cerca del protectorado von Valancius. Es esencial reanudar las comunicaciones con sus planetas y otorgar la sabiduría de sus decretos sobre sus respectivos administradores. Desarrollar colonias, capturar nuevos territorios y establecer rutas comerciales: todo esto es ahora su privilegio... y su carga».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir sind wieder in Reichweite des von Valancius-Protektorats. Es ist von höchster Dringlichkeit, die Kommunikation mit Euren Planeten wiederherzustellen und die Weisheit Eurer Dekrete an ihre Verwalter weiterzugeben. Die Erschließung von Kolonien, die Beanspruchung neuer Territorien und die Herstellung von Handelsbeziehungen — all das ist nun Euer Privileg ... und Eure Bürde."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous approchons de nouveau du protectorat des von Valancius. Il est urgent de rétablir la communication avec vos planètes et de prodiguer la sagesse de vos décrets à leurs gouverneurs. Développer vos colonies, conquérir de nouveaux territoires et établir des liens commerciaux, tout cela est désormais votre privilège... et votre fardeau. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous approchons de nouveau du protectorat des von Valancius. Il est urgent de rétablir la communication avec vos planètes et de prodiguer la sagesse de vos décrets à leurs gouverneurs. Développer vos colonies, conquérir de nouveaux territoires et établir des liens commerciaux, tout cela est désormais votre privilège... et votre fardeau. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、再びフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領まであと一歩というところまで来ました。一番急を要するのは、惑星との通信を復活させて、惑星の世話役に命令のお言葉を授けることです。コロニーの開発、新たな領地の主張、交易相手の確立など、どれも今やあなたの特権であり…重荷でもあります」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、再びフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領まであと一歩というところまで来ました。一番急を要するのは、惑星との通信を復活させて、惑星の世話役に命令のお言葉を授けることです。コロニーの開発、新たな領地の主張、交易相手の確立など、どれも今やあなたの特権であり…重荷でもあります」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bir kez daha von Valancius protektorasının sınırları içindeyiz. Gezegenlerinizle iletişimi yeniden sağlamak ve bilgece kararlarınızı yöneticilerine aktarmak, birincil önceliğimiz. Kolonilerinizin geliştirilmesi, yeni bölgeler ele geçirilmesi, ticari bağlantıların kurulması artık ayrıcalığınız... Hem de yükümlülüğünüz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are once more within reach of the von Valancius protectorate. Of utmost urgency is restoring communication with your planets and bestowing the wisdom of your decrees upon their stewards. Developing colonies, claiming new territories, and establishing trade links — all this is now your privilege... and burden."
